description: Default FAQ content for pet grooming tenants

faqs.question: What breeds do you groom?
faqs.answer: We groom dogs and cats of all breeds and sizes, from small dogs to large breeds. Our groomers are trained in breed-specific cuts and can accommodate any pet.

faqs.question: How often should I have my pet groomed?
faqs.answer: Most dogs benefit from professional grooming every 4-8 weeks, depending on breed and coat type. We can recommend a schedule based on your pet's specific needs.

faqs.question: Do I need to make an appointment?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work by appointment to ensure each pet receives our full attention. You can book online, by phone, or in person.

faqs.question: What's included in a full groom?
faqs.answer: Our full grooming service includes bath, blow dry, haircut/styling, nail trim, ear cleaning, sanitary trim, teeth brushing, and finishing cologne.

faqs.question: Do you offer cat grooming?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer specialized grooming services for cats with groomers experienced in handling felines. Services include baths, brush outs, nail trims, and lion cuts.

faqs.question: Can you handle anxious or difficult pets?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our groomers are trained in gentle handling techniques and work patiently with anxious pets. We take breaks as needed and use positive reinforcement.

faqs.question: What if I find fleas on my pet?
faqs.answer: We offer flea treatments and will notify you if we discover fleas during grooming. We recommend consulting your vet for comprehensive flea prevention.

faqs.question: Do you check for health issues?
faqs.answer: While we're not veterinarians, we do note any skin issues, lumps, ear problems, or other concerns and will alert you so you can follow up with your vet.

faqs.question: What vaccinations does my pet need?
faqs.answer: We require current rabies vaccination for all pets. Some groomers also require bordetella and distemper. Check with us for specific requirements.

faqs.question: How long will grooming take?
faqs.answer: Grooming time varies by service and pet size. Basic baths take 1-1.5 hours, while full grooming typically takes 2-3 hours. We'll give you an estimated pickup time when you drop off.

faqs.question: Can I stay during the grooming?
faqs.answer: For the best results and your pet's focus, we recommend dropping off and picking up. Many pets are calmer when their owner isn't present.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations may incur a fee.
